description: This drink is made with gin, lime juice, and simple syrup, just like the traditional&nbsp;gimlet. Cucumber juice can be added before the ingredients are shaken together to make the cucumber version.
name: Cucumber Juice Gimlet
recipeIngredient: A very thin slice of cucumber for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Juice the cucumber in a juicer and set it aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Juice the cucumber in a juicer and set it aside.

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, add gin, lime juice, and simple syrup. Shake well.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, add gin, lime juice, and simple syrup. Shake well.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin cucumber slice on top of the drink and serve.
